## AuthContainer.signupWithEmail() method

signupWithEmail is a shorthand of [the signup() method](./node-client.authcontainer.signup.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
signupWithEmail(email: string, password: string, options?: {
        realm?: string;
        metadata?: JSONObject;
    }): Promise<User>;
```
